tool_description: Validates user access controls, authentication mechanisms, and authorization policies to ensure compliance with PCI DSS access control requirements.

user_directory_path.description: Path to user directory or identity management system configuration.

access_control_policies.description: List of access control policy files to validate.

validate_mfa.description: Whether to validate multi-factor authentication configuration.

check_privileged_access.description: Whether to specifically validate privileged user access controls.

password_policy_file.description: Path to password policy configuration file.

session_timeout_minutes.description: Expected session timeout in minutes for validation (1-480).

audit_inactive_users_days.description: Number of days to consider a user account inactive (30-365).

error_messages: User directory not accessible: Verify the user_directory_path exists and is readable.
Invalid policy files: One or more access control policy files could not be found or parsed.
MFA configuration missing: Multi-factor authentication is enabled for validation but configuration is incomplete.
Invalid session timeout: session_timeout_minutes must be between 1 and 480 minutes.
Invalid inactive user period: audit_inactive_users_days must be between 30 and 365 days.
Password policy validation failed: Password policy file is corrupted or contains invalid settings.
Privileged access validation error: Unable to identify or validate privileged user accounts.
usage: Provide user directory path and access control policy files. Optionally enable MFA and privileged access validation, specify password policy file, and set session timeout and inactive user audit periods. The tool validates access controls against PCI DSS requirements 7 and 8.

total_users_audited.description: Total number of user accounts audited

privileged_users_count.description: Number of users with privileged access

mfa_compliance_rate.description: Percentage of users with properly configured MFA (0-100)

inactive_accounts.description: Number of inactive user accounts that should be disabled

password_policy_violations.description: Number of accounts with password policy violations

access_violations.description: List of access control violations found during validation
